title: Live briefing: Israeli cabinet to meet Tuesday to discuss cease-fire deal with Lebanon, officials say
content: Intense negotiations over the past week have brought Israel and Lebanon closer to a deal, but it has not yet been finalized.
summary: Intense negotiations over the past week have brought Israel and Lebanon closer to a deal, but it has not yet been finalized.

title: Director of one of last functioning hospitals in northern Gaza is injured
content: Hussam Abu Safiya said earlier that Kamal Adwan Hospital had been attacked seven times in a day. Also, the body of missing rabbi Zvi Kogan was found in the UAE.

title: U.S. condemns killing of Israeli Moldovan rabbi in UAE
Special relationship? Trump and U.K.’s Starmer may not be great chums.
content: President-elect Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer could hardly be more different. And Trump isn’t keen on Starmer’s Labour Party.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer could hardly be more different. And Trump isn’t keen on Starmer’s Labour Party.

title: Fire destroys more than 1,000 homes in Philippine shantytown
content: The fire spread rapidly through makeshift homes in Manila’s Tondo district, an official said, displacing 1,000 families. “It’s like you lit up a box of matches.”
summary: The fire spread rapidly through makeshift homes in Manila’s Tondo district, an official said, displacing 1,000 families. “It’s like you lit up a box of matches.”

title: Fighting in Lebanon intensifies around Israel’s deepest known advances

War fatigue deepens in Israel as deaths mount and fighting expands
content: A growing number of Israeli reservists are choosing not to report for duty, putting further strain on an overextended military amid an ever-widening war.
summary: A growing number of Israeli reservists are choosing not to report for duty, putting further strain on an overextended military amid an ever-widening war.

title: Deadly Israeli strike in Beirut adds to fears the war is escalating
content: Saturday’s attack completely demolished a multistory building in a densely populated neighborhood. Israel did not say who the strike’s target was.
summary: Saturday’s attack completely demolished a multistory building in a densely populated neighborhood. Israel did not say who the strike’s target was.

title: Israel investigates disappearance of Chabad emissary

content: The target of the attack on the Basta area was not immediately clear. The Israel Defense Forces did not appear to have posted an evacuation order for that area beforehand.

title: Northern Gaza hospital attacked 7 times in one day, director says
